name: RI_1_1_12_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Re_Identification_Event
title: RI.1.1.12.1 Evidence of Record Entry Re-Identification Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Re-Identification Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Re-Identification Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHALL audit each occurrence when Record Entry content is re-identified.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the organization where Record Entry content is re-identified.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the patient who is subject of re-identified Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the user re-identifying Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture identity of the system application which re-identified Record Entry content.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., re-identify).

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHALL capture the date and time Record Entry content is re-identified.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entry content is re-identified.

statement.label: RI.1.1.12.1#09
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for re-identifying Record Entry content.
